Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Associate lecturer of Financial Derivatives, Leeds University Business School (UK)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: 2008 IAFDS - International Accounting and Finance Doctoral Symposium Prato (Italy)
2008 FMA – Financial Management Association Prague (Czech Republic)
2009 EFMA – European Financial Management Association Milan (Italy)
2012 MAF – Mathematics and Statistics for Insurance and Finance Venice (Italy)
2012 EFMA – European Financial Management Association Barcelona (Spain)
2013 AIDEA – Italian Academy of Management Lecce (Italy)
2014 EFMA – European Financial Management Association Rome (Italy)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Member of the research project "Delisting of Companies and Minority Shareholder Protection", funded by the Ministry of Education, University and Research in 2008 (PRIN, local unit at University of Bologna).

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Dipartimento di Scienze dell’Economia e della Gestione Aziendale, Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore di Milano, miglior tesi di dottorato
Membro accademico, International Accounting and Finance Doctoral Symposium (http://www.iafds.org)
